About the Company: Relish Pharmaceuticals Limited is a public limited company with a global perspective, manufacturing, exporting and marketing in both domestic and international markets. They have assisted in the development and manufacture of a wide variety of drugs and dosage forms and potency variations for many prestigious pharmaceuticals companies around the world. Their mission is to be diversified Business Corporation to achieve leadership by exceeding customer expectation in domestic as well as overseas markets. They are located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat.
